maple: A005687:=1/(z**5-z**2+2*z-1)/(-1+z**2+z**5); # Conjectured by _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.a:= n-> (Matrix(10, (i,j)-> if (i=j-1) then 1 elif j=1 then [2,0,-2,1,2,-2,0,0,0,-1][i] else 0 fi)^n)[1,8]: seq(a(n), n=7..70); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 14 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 14 2008
